name: Not in the Lifetime Tour
description: The revived Guns N’ Roses and its successful Not in the Lifetime Tour will be seen at the festival. One of the most legendary hard rock bands, Guns N’Roses has been rejoined by Saul Hudson, better known as Slash, who returns to the group following differences with Axl Rose to join forces with the group’s other founder and bass player, Duff McKagan.

name: CONCRETE AND GOLD TOUR 2018
description: Concrete and Gold Tour is the ninth and current concert tour by American rock band Foo Fighters, in support of their ninth studio album Concrete and Gold.
